title: Real Estate VA - KVCORE MASTERY
job_overview:
We’re looking for a detail-oriented, creative, and motivated Real Estate Virtual Assistant with expert-level KVCore skills. This role involves working closely with our team to keep operations running smoothly, from lead follow-up and transaction coordination to social media and marketing. If you’re passionate about real estate, a superstar with KVCore, and eager to grow with us, we’d love to hear from you!

To apply make sure you attach as well your resume link.

Key Responsibilities:
-Manage and organize real estate leads directly in KVCore.
-Create and oversee automated follow-up campaigns to keep in touch with prospective clients.
-Provide regular reports on lead flow, conversions, and performance.
-Support transaction coordination using SkySlope and Upgrade to see actual info.
-Use CRMLS to gather data and track real estate market trends.
-Provide data-informed insights to aid pricing and marketing strategies.
-Perform competitive analyses to keep us a step ahead in the market.
-Implement automated follow-up routines (SMS, email) to keep clients engaged.
-Develop onboarding processes for new clients, ensuring their experience is smooth and welcoming.

To apply make sure you attach as well your resume link.

Requirements:
-Proven experience as a Real Estate Virtual Assistant with strong KVCore skills.
-Ability to efficiently track and manage leads, campaigns, and follow-up routines in KVCore.
-Experience with SkySlope and Upgrade to see actual info for transaction coordination.
-Ability to extract data and perform market analysis with CRMLS.
-Familiar with designing social media content and employing video-editing tools.
-Excellent communication skills (written and verbal) in English.
-Highly organized, motivated, and able to work independently in a remote setting.
